#sidebar Index

Current mrxvt maintainer(s)

    * Jimmy Zhou (aka Terminator) <jimmyzhou@users.sourceforge.net>
    * Gautam Iyer <gi1242@users.sourceforge.net> 

If you're enquiring about a bug, feature, or submitting a patch, please use the [Community development mailing list]. Contact us individually only if you have a question of a different nature (e.g. you want access to this wiki / join the mrxvt development team, or if you have found a security hole you do not want to make public).
